features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride two-layer fabric[2,000mm/600g]is highly breathable, waterproof, and quick-drying, PFC-free DWR coating
Low-bulk Thermolite®[180g]insulation uses 40% recycled material to trap warm air and features a larger surface area to boost moisture evaporation
Stretch binding at cuffs and hem
Welt-entry microfleece hand-warmer pockets and zippered chest pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
